name: App
description: Composite app wrapper with shadcn theme and overlay handling.

use: you want a minimal WidgetsApp wrapper with shadcn theme and overlay manager.
you need a clean entry for typography and icon styling via `ShadcnUI`.
avoid: you require a full MaterialApp without customization.

theming: Uses `ThemeData` from `Theme.of(context)` and supports adaptive scaling.
accessibility: Ensure the app provides semantic labels for navigation and actions.
